column4: Is there a certain way that I should type somones use name in irc for them to see im talking to them (like on koversation when someone says my name its red) and i know they are talking to me , makes convo alot easier to read threw
nope.. just the nick with a colon after will do
the coloured text and optional sound is all done in the client
also, try pressing <tab> to autocomplete nicks
